newsitem.title: USA: MAPICS offers 6 mln shrs at $9/shr.
newsitem.headline: MAPICS offers 6 mln shrs at $9/shr.

text.p: MAPICS Inc, formerly Marcam Corp, said Wednesday it has started a public offering of up to 6.0 million common shares at $9.00 a share.
MAPICS, a provider of enterprise resource planning software, said net proceeds will be used to repay debt.
It said the offering's managing underwritrers are Donaldson, Lufkin & Jenrette Securities Corp, Lazard Freres & Co LLC and Dain Bosworth Inc.
MAPICS said that Marcam Corp's spinoff to its stockholders of its business related to the PRISM, Protean and Avantis product line has been completed.
The company spunoff, now known as Marcam Solutions, began trading today on the Nasdaq under the symbol MRCM.O, it said.
